page.title: 19 Tasley Church
page.content:
{ { Tasley Church}is beatifully set about a mile up{Church Lane}on the outskirts of Bridgnorth. There has been a{church}or{chapel}in Tasley since Records of Annual Values began in{1291.
The{original}church has been much {added}to and it has been{repaired}with both{brick}and{timber.}At one time it was probably{thatched,}but has since been{tiled.
The church is{dedicated}to{two saints,{St Peter}and{St Paul.}Around it is a small and very peaceful {graveyard}and from the back is a beautiful{view}towards the Parish of {Morville.
